fixes.name: Enter The Date
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau date literal #2017-09-04# into the equivalent DAX DATE(2017, 9, 4). Implemented as a measure because this calculation represents a parameter/date constant and parameter-related items must be measures in Power BI.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This is a Tableau parameter/date constant; per the rules, parameter references and parameter-defined values must be created as measures.
